backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with user profiles, posts, comments, notifications, messaging, stories, feature flags, and authorization/storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Sets global CSS variables for light/dark themes and applies Tailwind base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures React Query and TanStack Router routes with auth guards and a global error fallback.
frontend/src/components/admin/FeatureFla: Admin UI panel to view and update feature flags with loading, error, and success handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/PostModera: Displays a list of posts for admins to review, showing author info, thumbnails, and allowing post deletion. Handles loading, image fallback, and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/SupportIss: Shows support issues with creator info, category labels, and status controls. Allows admins to update issue status with feedback and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserModera: Provides tools to search users and modify verification, blocking, and role status. Includes validation, error handling, and admin restrictions.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Defines page layout with header, footer, main content outlet, and mobile tab bar.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Renders a login page with an Internet Identity sign‑in button and loading state. Displays app branding and simple authentication UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps protected routes, handling authentication, profile loading, timeouts, and profile setup. Shows appropriate fallback screens for errors or missing profiles.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Guards routes based on required user role, showing loading, error, or access‑denied states. Redirects unauthorized users to home.
Shows a horizontal scroll row of stories with avatars, loading placeholders, and a viewer dialog. Fetches active stories and opens them on click.
frontend/src/components/IdeaList.tsx: Placeholder component showing a stub ideas list message.
frontend/src/components/IdeaSubmissionFo: Placeholder form component showing a stub idea submission message.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageHeade: Displays a page title, optional description, and optional action buttons in a header layout.
frontend/src/components/nav/HeaderNav.ts: Top navigation bar showing links, notifications, settings, and user avatar with role-based admin link.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileTabBar: Mobile bottom tab bar providing quick navigation and role-based admin access with profile button.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Displays a full post with author info, image handling, likes, comments, sharing, and optional deletion.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostGrid.t: Renders a grid of posts with image thumbnails and navigation to individual posts.
frontend/src/components/profile/EditProf: Modal form allowing users to edit profile fields, validate input, and submit updates.
frontend/src/components/profile/FollowBu: Follow/unfollow button managing follow state, pending requests, and mutation actions.
frontend/src/components/profile/FollowRe: Panel listing pending follow requests with approve and deny actions.
frontend/src/components/profile/Highligh: Static highlights row with a new highlight button and placeholder highlight items.
frontend/src/components/profile/MediaCon: Panel to view and toggle global media feature flags, with loading and error states and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: Renders a user avatar with size variants and a fallback image.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog for creating a user profile with form fields, validation, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/SuperAdm: Admin panel to manage a user's verification state with restrictions for admin roles.
frontend/src/components/profile/Verified: SVG verified badge component supporting color variants.
frontend/src/components/stories/CreateSt: Dialog for uploading and previewing an image to create a story with validation and mutation.
frontend/src/components/stories/StoryVie: Story viewing dialog showing the image, author info, and like interactions with error handling.
frontend/src/constants/appVersion.ts: Exports the current application version constant.
frontend/src/constants/superAdmin.ts: Defines the super-admin principal and helper function to check it.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook to create and manage the backend actor based on identity and refresh dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorInitTimeout.t: Tracks actor fetch duration and returns true if it exceeds 15 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminModeration.ts: Defines a mutation placeholder for setting user verification state and invalidates profile queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppIdeas.ts: Provides stub hooks for app ideas and idea submission, both unimplemented.
Wraps toast notifications to display formatted backend errors or success messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the caller's effective role using the actor and identity, with super-admin override logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useFeatureFlags.ts: Fetches and updates backend feature flags with error formatting and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useFollowRequests.ts: Stub hooks for follow request fetching and actions; all backend methods are missing.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, authentication state, and login/logout handling via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: Implements placeholder messaging hooks; all backend message methods throw errors and trigger query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Stub hooks for notifications; fetching disabled and mutation throws due to missing backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/usePostImageSrc.ts: Converts an ExternalBlob to a safe image URL with validation, fallbacks, and cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/usePosts.ts: Defines post-related hooks, all dependent on missing backend methods and wired to invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfiles.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile data, though create and update operations are stubbed with missing backend methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialGraph.ts: Hooks to fetch followers/following and perform follow actions, all currently stubbed due to missing backend methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useStories.ts: Story-related query and mutation hooks including fetching, creating, and liking stories, mostly placeholders due to absent backend endpoints.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupport.ts: Support issue submission, retrieval, and status update hooks, all failing due to unimplemented backend methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemePreference.ts: Manages light/dark theme preference with localStorage syncing and DOM class updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserModerationActi: Provides mutation hooks for blocking, unblocking, and changing user roles via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes along with small animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry mounting React, setting up QueryClient and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPortalPage.tsx: Admin moderation portal with tabbed panels for users, posts, features, and support management.
frontend/src/pages/ConversationPage.tsx: Handles creating or loading a conversation with a peer, displays messages with auto‑scroll, and allows sending new messages with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Provides a form to create a post with caption and optional image, including validation, preview handling, and blocked‑user restrictions.
frontend/src/pages/ExplorePage.tsx: Implements user search by username and shows recent posts along with profile previews for matched users.
frontend/src/pages/FollowersFollowingPag: Displays either the followers or following list for a user, including loading states, error states, and navigation to profiles.
frontend/src/pages/HomeFeedPage.tsx: Loads and displays the home feed with stories, posts, and error or empty‑state handling.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesPage.tsx: Shows the user’s conversation list with last messages and unread counts, with navigation into individual conversations.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Renders the notifications list, handles loading/error states, unread counts, and marking notifications as read, including follow request display.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single post with likes, comments, image loading, and interactions such as liking, commenting, and sharing.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows a user's profile with posts, followers, role-based UI, and actions like following, messaging, and editing when applicable.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides user settings including theme selection, logout, support navigation, and app info display.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Allows users to submit support issues with category selection, validation, and success/error handling.
frontend/src/types/missing-backend-types: Defines TypeScript types for backend models such as posts, comments, stories, notifications, and support issues.
frontend/src/utils/formatBackendError.ts: Maps backend and IC agent error messages to user-friendly strings with fallbacks for unknown cases.
frontend/src/utils/postImage.ts: Provides helpers to convert image byte data to blob URLs, revoke them, and turn File objects into Uint8Array for uploads.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and handling hash-based routing.
frontend/src/utils/verifiedBadge.ts: Determines which badge color to show for a user based on role, super-admin status, and verification state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending fonts, colors, animations, and container settings for the project.
project_state.json: Project state file describing app goals, architecture notes, known issues, and feature requirements for ongoing development.
